name: opencode-roadmap
description: Create and maintain persistent project roadmaps that survive across OpenCode sessions, helping you track long-term goals, milestones, and feature development plans.

installation.summary: Install via npm to create persistent project roadmaps and track feature development across multiple sessions.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install -g opencode-roadmap
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugin": ["opencode-roadmap"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode to enable roadmap management features.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

### Creating a Roadmap
```
/roadmap create "E-commerce Platform Rebuild"
```

### Adding Milestones
```
/roadmap add-milestone "User Authentication" --priority high
/roadmap add-milestone "Product Catalog" --priority high
/roadmap add-milestone "Shopping Cart" --priority medium
/roadmap add-milestone "Payment Integration" --priority high
```

### Tracking Progress
```
/roadmap status              # View current progress
/roadmap complete <id>       # Mark milestone complete
/roadmap update <id> <text>  # Update milestone details
```

### Features
- **Persistent Storage**: Roadmaps saved across sessions
- **Milestone Tracking**: Organize work into phases
- **Priority Levels**: High, medium, low prioritization
- **Progress Visualization**: See completion status
- **Multiple Roadmaps**: Manage different projects

### Example Roadmap
```
Project: Mobile App Rewrite
├─ ✓ Setup React Native environment
├─ ⏳ Implement navigation structure
├─ ⏳ Build authentication flow
├─ ○ Create API integration layer
└─ ○ Implement offline support

Progress: 20% (1/5 complete)
```
